name: BYOC@Home
description:
Welcome to the BYOC@Home!

It is a simulation game developed during a 48-hour contest for Quakecon@Home.

Community images make up the content found within this virtual representation of the Bring Your Own Computer (BYOC).

The goal is to find your Home computer seat. It is the only computer in the BYOC that has a special home screen.

Controls

Use WASD to move and Mouse to look.

You can also move faster while holding Shift, and crouch with Ctrl.

As time goes on, the BYOC will change around you. If you take too long you might be left in the surreal aftermath of the convention!
